rows.label: qst200517_msg001
rows.name:
Wow... This IS a swanky looking
place, isn't it? And in an
excellent location, too.

rows.label: qst200517_msg002
rows.name: You seem to be quite enamored with it.

rows.label: qst200517_msg003
rows.name:
I can't deny it. I'd love to set
up shop in a place like this.

rows.label: qst200517_msg004
rows.name:
Then I see no reason for you not
to accept Alban's kind offer.

rows.label: qst200517_msg005
rows.name:
But what are you gonna put on sale?
You can't open shop without having
some kind of supplies, right?

rows.label: qst200517_msg006
rows.name:
Well, I've made all sorts
of candy in my free time.

rows.label: qst200517_msg007
rows.name:
I thought maybe I could rustle
up a few new recipes based
on my past experiments.

rows.label: qst200517_msg008
rows.name: Nice. Sign me up as a taste tester!

rows.label: qst200517_msg009
rows.name:
But first, we'll need the
raw ingredients. We can't
start without those.

rows.label: qst200517_msg010
rows.name:
I see. Then tell us where to find
them. We'll gather them for you.

rows.label: qst200517_msg011
rows.name: That'd be a great help, thanks.

rows.label: qst200517_msg012
rows.name:
All right, so first up we're going
to make cookies. I've thought up
three recipes we could use for that.

rows.label: qst200517_msg013
rows.name:
Hot Cookies, Neon Cookies
and Blood Cookies.

rows.label: qst200517_msg014
rows.name:
I want to start off with a
selection of those three and
offer them to customers as samples.

rows.label: qst200517_msg015
rows.name:
Gotcha. Come on, guys. Let's
get moving before I start
drooling in anticipation!
